## BaseProvider.getSequenceValue() method

获取实体sequence，针对主键生成策略为sequence时有效

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSequenceValue(em: EntityManager, seqName: string, schema?: string): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  em | [EntityManager](./relaen.entitymanager.md) | entity manager |
|  seqName | string | sequence name |
|  schema | string | _(Optional)_ schema |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

sequence 值
